item.title: Survivors 'nervous and sceptical' about release of remaining Epstein files
item.description: US lawmakers who pushed for the documents to be made public have criticised the initial release as incomplete.

item.title: US seizes vessel off Venezuela's coast, officials say
item.description: The move comes after US President Donald Trump ordered a "blockade" of sanctioned oil tankers entering and leaving Venezuela.

item.title: Engineer becomes first wheelchair user to go to space
item.description: "It was the coolest experience!" said Michaela Benthaus after the 10-minute Blue Origin flight.

item.title: Who and what are in the Epstein files?
item.description: High-profile figures, including Bill Clinton and Michael Jackson, can be seen in the long-awaited files.

item.title: US carries out 'massive' strike against IS in Syria
item.description: The US says it struck dozens of targets across Syria in response to last week's deadly Islamic State attack on US forces there.
